Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.listener

Interface DynamicSplashListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicSplashActivity
public interface DynamicSplashListener
An interface to implement the splash screen and to get various callbacks while showing the splash.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    doBehindSplash()
    This method will be called after starting the splash background task.
    Fragment
    getContentFragment(int layoutRes)
    This method will be called to create the splash fragment instance.
    int
    getLayoutRes()
    This method will be called to get the layout resource for the splash.
    long
    getMinSplashTime()
    This method will be called to get the minimum time in milliseconds for which the splash must be displayed.
    void
    onPostSplash()
    This method will be called after finishing the splash background task.
    void
    onPreSplash()
    This method will be called before starting the splash background task.
    void
    onViewCreated(View view)
    This method will be called just after creating the splash fragment with the supplied layout resource.

  • Method Details

    • getLayoutRes

      @LayoutRes int getLayoutRes()
      This method will be called to get the layout resource for the splash.
      Returns:
      The splash layout resource.

    • getContentFragment

      @Nullable Fragment getContentFragment(@LayoutRes int layoutRes)
      This method will be called to create the splash fragment instance.
      Parameters:
      layoutRes - The layout resource file for the fragment.
      Returns:
      The splash fragment instance.

    • onViewCreated

      void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view)
      This method will be called just after creating the splash fragment with the supplied layout resource.

      Do any modifications in the splash layout here.

      Parameters:
      view - The view created from the layout resource.

    • getMinSplashTime

      long getMinSplashTime()
      This method will be called to get the minimum time in milliseconds for which the splash must be displayed.
      Returns:
      The minimum time in milliseconds for which the splash must be displayed.

    • onPreSplash

      void onPreSplash()
      This method will be called before starting the splash background task.

    • doBehindSplash

      void doBehindSplash()
      This method will be called after starting the splash background task.

      Do any time taking operation here. Do not perform any UI related operation here, use onPostSplash() here.

    • onPostSplash

      void onPostSplash()
      This method will be called after finishing the splash background task.
